a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in per capita COâ‚‚ emissions and GDP, World
Consumption-based emissions are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures fossil fuel
and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank, Our World in Data based on the Global Carbon Project
Note: GDP figures are adjusted for inflation.
